item.description:
It seems I have Wednesday off, and the weather will be nice. Not as nice as this past weekend, but still nice enough for a hike. We will hike the Blue Hills.

We can start at Houghton's Pond and explore the hills in the middle section of the reservation. Any ideas feel free to throw them out there.

I know this is short notice but I thought I would throw it out there. I'm open to suggestions and would accommodate location, distance, and start time for the desires of the group.

I'll adjust the details according to the feedback we get.
item.name: Veterans day Hike
